meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #761.

td.p: Karen Dauphin, a teacher from Burbank, California
Kurt Webber, an army officer originally from Lakeland, Florida
Ralph Biancalana, a college graduate from Houston, Texas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $800)

tr.td: ASTRONOMY
WORLD RELIGION
PEOPLE
TV TRIVIA
HISTORY
RHYME TIME
